name: BLOODRUNNER
description:
DESCRIPTION

Run as far as possible within the 60 second timelimit, using your remains from previous runs as slippery boosts.

Dead in a minute + An Infinite Runner where Obstacles help you

USED ASSETS AND RESOURCES

Environmentals from the Paper Pixels Pack

SFX made in SFXR

Song by Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Rabbit Town

ADDED/CHANGED IN V2.0

- Removed bumpiness from the tilemap using a composite collider 2D
- Added a player character with a simple walking animation
- Added true infinite level generation, with a small variety of level chunks to cycle through (open to additions)
- Added a score system based on distance travelled, logging the highest distance traveled as a highscore
- Added audio feedback for speed increase and death
- Added music
